channel.title: Luís's Garden

item.title: Splot
item.author: Luís Silva
item.description: I've built Splot, a svelte kit app powered by pocketbase, to manage my and my girlfriend's expenses and payments.

item.title: Going to Miami beach and hating every second of it

item.description: My adventures going to Miami to present a paper that I wrote for my master's thesis

item.title: Software is like Tetris
item.author: Luís Silva
item.description: Exploration of the similarities between software development and the game Tetris.
